Title: The Angel of San Bernardino
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jason Ning, Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Mike Costa (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Tricia Helfer
Plot: Lucifer and Chloe investigate a murder where a witness claims a winged guardian angel saved her life; Pierce and Chloe's relationship takes an interesting turn; Lucifer discovers something that could change everything.
